scripts.full-install: cd common && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build & cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd common && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:ci: cd common && npm run lint:ci && cd ../server && npm run lint:ci && cd ../client && npm run lint:ci
